articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: Not Upgraded Since 20 Years, Outdated British Challenger-2 Tanks Arrive In Ukraine Only To Get A Brave Death – Russian Media - EurAsian Times
articles.description: German Leopard-2 and British Challenger-2 tanks have been handed over to Ukraine in a move that will significantly bolster Kyiv’s firepower.
articles.content: Two months after they were first promised, German Leopard-2 and British Challenger-2 tanks have finally been handed over to Ukraine in a move expected to bolster Kyiv’s armored firepower significantl… [+8384 chars]
